messages.content:
#Instructions
Analyze the transcript and determine if the user was interested in buying a property.

Just output Yes or No

Transcript: {{1.call.transcript}}

#Example output
Yes

messages.content:
#Instructions
Extract from the transcript the time and date of the appointment that has been booked between the user and the assistant

Use this format HH:mm DD/MM/YYYY

Transcript: {{1.call.transcript}}

Remember the date has to be later than right now: {{now}}

Example output:
19:00 12/03/2025

mapper.body:
Hey there, you have received an email with the appointment information. James will get in contact with you shortly

Remember the date of appointment: {{7.choices[].message.content}}
